alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:17AM EST until February 12 at 12:24AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at J.T. Meyers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam has already crested or will crest soon, and then they will all fall below flood stage this weekend. For the Ohio River...including J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 39.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
